snippet.title: Rendering Ranger: R2 [Rewind] - Official Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Check out gameplay and learn more about the features of Rendering Ranger: R² in this trailer for the sidescrolling action game. Developed by Manfred Trenz (creator of the Turrican series) and published by German software powerhouse Rainbow Arts, this game was originally released in 1995. Originally slated to come to the West as Targa, the game ultimately ended up as a Japan-only title, with only 10,000 copies printed, making it one of the most sought-after collectibles in retro gaming. Rendering Ranger: R2 will be available in 2025 (digital). You are the Rendering Ranger known as Double R, a special forces soldier who must defend the Earth from a devastating alien invasion.
